alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 10:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...GUSTY OUTFLOW WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN YAVAPAI COUNTY THROUGH 1130 PM MST... At 1041 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary along a line extending from near Horseshoe Reservoir to near New River to near Peoria. Movement was northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and reduced visibility down to a mile at times in blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hazardous travel do to reduced visibility in blowing dust. Locations impacted include... Cordes Junction, Bumble Bee, Cordes Lakes, Lake Pleasant, Black Canyon City, Castle Hot Springs, Wagoner, Cordes, Horseshoe Reservoir, Spring Valley, Crown King, Rock Springs, Hazlett Hollow Campground, and Turney Gulch Group Campground. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 242 and 268. State Route 89 between mile markers 258 and 259. State Route 69 between mile markers 263 and 267. Highway 93 between mile markers 193 and 196. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. Slow down and use caution if traveling and be prepared for reduced visibility.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
